resp = client.search(
    index="job-candidates",
    query={
        "terms_set": {
            "programming_languages": {
                "terms": [
                    "c++",
                    "java",
                    "php"
                ],
                "minimum_should_match_script": {
                    "source": "Math.min(params.num_terms, doc['required_matches'].value)"
                },
                "boost": 1
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
